Reviews.Title: So upset!
Reviews.Author: Lily rusi
Reviews.Content: The battery is not comparable with my Sony came dsc- h55. It says its compatable with all the types of cameras listed but that's false, the battery itself says its compatablle with something completely different then mine. So much for my sons birthday pictures. But on the bright side, amazon did a great job with refunding my money.

Reviews.Title: WRONG MEMORY CHIP & CAN'T BE REPLACED !!
Reviews.Author: William A. Shinkle
Reviews.Content: THE MEMORY CHIP WAS THE MAIN REASON TO ORDER THIS KIT; ALL THE REST OF THE CONTENTS ARE ABLE TO BE USED, BUT, THE CHIP WAS MY MAIN REASON FOR ORDERING.
